channel.title: Portforward help
channel.description:
got a routeur Speedtouch 516 v6 and i don't know how to portforward. I need player on my server.
I looked at guides on www.portforward.com and i found nothing. I don't have a network. I don't know why.
Can someone help me please?

item.title: Portforward help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

They cannot connect by using my IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforward help
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:3, topic:248968”]People can connect on my server. So, they cannot with the routeur i have?

:’([/quote]

Can they connect to your server using your IP, or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Portforward help
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

People can connect on my server. So, they cannot with the routeur i have?

:’(

item.title: Portforward help
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:1, topic:248968”]got a routeur Speedtouch 516 v6 and i don’t know how to portforward. I need player on my server.

I looked at guides on www.portforward.com and i found nothing.
I don’t have a network. I don’t know why.

Can someone help me please? [/quote]

Have you had anyone try to connect to your IP?
I have a speed touch plug and play; but it appears to be a modem, so no portforwarding for me. Maybe it is the same case for you…

I may be wrong, but worth a try?

Read full topic
